articles.author: Michael Sun
articles.title: Booing and walkouts after the Killers tell Georgia audience Russian is their ‘brother’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Backlash after lead singer Brandon Flowers welcomes on stage fan from country that invaded and still occupies part of former Soviet state
articles.content: The Killers have apologised after lead singer Brandon Flowers was booed forbringing a Russian fan onstage at a concert in Georgia the former Soviet state that Russia invaded in 2008 and urging the cr… [+4442 chars]
